Name: Magic Blast VR
About the game: 'Have you ever wanted to fight with magic?' 'Magic Blast VR' is an action game to fight with magic in VR! In this game you can create original magic, and fights a lot of enemies. This game features 'Magic Form' system. It can set your own form and shoot magic! You may be able to reproduce the special movement of your favorite character...
Meta Title: Magic Blast VR: Sep 22, 2018, Ramen and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Magic Blast VR? Check out the release date (Sep 22, 2018), developer insights from Ramen, and a complete game summary.
